當.definition: at or in the very same...; suitable; adequate; fitting; proper; to replace; to regard as; to think; to pawn; (coll.) to fail (a student)

當一天和尚撞一天鐘.pinyin: dang1 yi1 tian1 he2 shang5 zhuang4 yi1 tian1 zhong1
當一天和尚撞一天鐘.definition: see 做一天和尚撞一天鐘|做一天和尚撞一天钟[zuo4 yi1 tian1 he2 shang5 zhuang4 yi1 tian1 zhong1]

當上.definition: to take up duty as; to assume a position; to assume; to take on (an office)

當下.definition: immediately; at once; at that moment; at the moment

當世.definition: the present age; in office; the current office holder

當世之冠.definition: the foremost person of his age; unequalled; a leading light

當世冠.definition: the foremost person of his age; unequalled; a leading light

當中.definition: among; in the middle; in the center

當之有愧.definition: to feel undeserving of the praise or the honor

當之無愧.definition: fully deserving, without any reservations (idiom); entirely worthy (of a title, honor etc)

當事.definition: to consider as a matter of importance; to be of importance

當事人.definition: persons involved or implicated; party (to an affair)

當事者.definition: the person involved; the people holding power

當仁不讓.definition: to be unwilling to pass on one's responsibilities to others

當今.definition: the present time; (old) (in reference to the reigning monarch) His Majesty

當代.definition: the present age; the contemporary era

當代新儒家.definition: Contemporary New Confucianism; see 新儒家[Xin1 Ru2 jia1]

當作.definition: to treat as; to regard as

當做.definition: to treat as; to regard as; to look upon as

當兒.definition: the very moment; just then; during (that brief interval)

當兵.definition: to serve in the army; to be a soldier

當前.definition: the present time; to be faced with

當務之急.definition: (idiom) top priority job; a matter of the greatest urgency

當回事.definition: to take seriously (often with negative expression: "don't take it too seriously"); to treat conscientiously

當回事兒.definition: erhua variant of 當回事|当回事[dang4 hui2 shi4]

當地居民.definition: a local person; the local population

當場.definition: at the scene; on the spot

當夜.definition: that very night; the same night

當天事當天畢.pinyin: dang4 tian1 shi4 dang4 tian1 bi4
當天事當天畢.definition: never put off until tomorrow what you can do today (idiom)

當官不為民做主不如回家賣紅薯.pinyin: dang1 guan1 bu4 wei4 min2 zuo4 zhu3 bu4 ru2 hui2 jia1 mai4 hong2 shu3
當官不為民做主不如回家賣紅薯.definition: if an official does not put the people first, he might as well go home and sell sweet potatoes

當家.definition: to manage the household; to be the one in charge of the family; to call the shots; to be in charge

當家作主.definition: to be in charge in one's own house (idiom); to be the master of one's own affairs

當局者迷，旁觀者清.pinyin: dang1 ju2 zhe3 mi2 , pang2 guan1 zhe3 qing1
當局者迷，旁觀者清.definition: (idiom) an outsider can see things more clearly or objectively than those involved

當心.definition: to take care; to look out

當成.definition: to consider as; to take to be

當掉.definition: to fail (a student); to pawn; (of a computer or program) to crash; to stop working

當政.definition: to come to power; to hold power; in office

當斷不斷.definition: (idiom) to waver when decisiveness is needed

當斷則斷.definition: to make a decision when it's time to decide

當斷即斷.definition: not to delay making a decision when a decision is needed

當日.definition: that very day; the same day

當機.definition: to crash (of a computer); to stop working; (loanword from English "down")

當權者.definition: ruler; those in power; the authorities

當涂.definition: Dangtu, a county in Ma'anshan 馬鞍山|马鞍山[Ma3an1shan1], Anhui

當涂縣.definition: Dangtu, a county in Ma'anshan 馬鞍山|马鞍山[Ma3an1shan1], Anhui

當然.definition: only natural; as it should be; certainly; of course; without doubt

當牛作馬.definition: to work like a horse and toil like an ox; fig. to slave for sb

當真.definition: to take seriously; serious; No joking, really!

當眾.definition: in public; in front of everybody

當紅.definition: currently popular (of movie stars, singers etc)

當耳旁風.definition: lit. to treat (what sb says) as wind past your ear; fig. to completely disregard

當耳邊風.definition: lit. to treat (what sb says) as wind past your ear; fig. to completely disregard

當著.definition: in front of; in the presence of

當街.definition: in the middle of the street; facing the street

當道.definition: in the middle of the road; to be in the way; to hold power; (fig.) to predominate; to be in vogue

當選.definition: to be elected; to be selected

當陽.definition: see 當陽市|当阳市[Dang1yang2 Shi4]

當陽市.definition: Dangyang, county-level city in Yichang 宜昌市[Yi2chang1 Shi4], Hubei

當雄.definition: Damxung county, Tibetan: 'Dam gzhung rdzong in Lhasa 拉薩|拉萨[La1 sa4], Tibet

當雄縣.definition: Damxung county, Tibetan: 'Dam gzhung rdzong in Lhasa 拉薩|拉萨[La1 sa4], Tibet

當面.definition: to sb's face; in sb's presence

當面鑼，對面鼓.pinyin: dang1 mian4 luo2 , dui4 mian4 gu3
當面鑼，對面鼓.definition: lit. gong facing gong, drum opposite drum (idiom); fig. to come together to thrash out the issue face to face
